title: Meet Helene Darroze, world's best female chef
text: BING NEWS: Meet Helene Darroze, world's best female chef On this month's episode of Culinary Journeys we follow French chef Helene Darroze to Edinburgh, where she samples a traditional Scottish dish -- haggis. Show premieres September 4 on CNN International at 1630 BST/1730 CET and 2330 BST/0030 CET.
